content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Singapore national futsal team" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(January 2022)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)* The **Singapore national futsal team** is controlled by the [Football Association of Singapore](/wiki/Football_Association_of_Singapore), the governing body for [futsal](/wiki/Futsal) in [Singapore](/wiki/Singapore). It represents the country in international competitions, such as the [World Cup](/wiki/FIFA_Futsal_World_Cup) and the [AFC Futsal Championship](/wiki/AFC_Futsal_Championship). ## Tournaments ### [FIFA Futsal World Cup](/wiki/FIFA_Futsal_World_Cup) - (/wiki/1989_FIFA_Futsal_World_Championship) – *Did not enter* - (/wiki/1992_FIFA_Futsal_World_Championship) – *Did not enter* - (/wiki/2008_FIFA_Futsal_World_Cup) – *Did not enter* - (/wiki/2012_FIFA_Futsal_World_Cup) – *Did not enter* - (/wiki/2016_FIFA_Futsal_World_Cup) – *Did not qualify* -
